alert.note: Alert for Sanborn (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 28 at 11:46PM MDT until May 29 at 12:30AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN DAVISON...SANBORN...BEADLE...NORTHEASTERN AURORA AND EASTERN JERAULD COUNTIES... At 1246 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Hitchcock to 10 miles east of Alpena to near Letcher, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Huron, Hitchcock, Cavour and Yale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
